details: "Englishman in New York" is a song by English artist Sting, from his second studio album ...Nothing Like the Sun, released in October 1987.

challenge.prompt: Complete the lyrics of Englishman in New York by Sting.
challenge.text:
♫ I don't drink coffee, . .... ..., .. ....
 I like my toast done on one side
    And you can hear it in my accent when I talk
    I'm an Englishman in New York ♫
